message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper proposes a novel task of automatic academic paper rating (AAPR) which involves determining whether to accept academic papers. This task is related to natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) which are covered in the cs.CL and cs.IR sub-categories of arXiv CS. The proposed model is based on a modularized hierarchical convolutional neural network which is a deep learning technique covered in the cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.DL sub-categories. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL and cs.IR, followed by cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.DL.
